item.description:
To those people coming for dinner, let's meet in the front lobby of 1149 at 6pm. This is a busy time of day for the restaurant. After we see how many people we have for dinner, then we can be seated. Too many "Maybe/not sure" responses - I was unable to reserve a table with the information that you provided!




Let's get together for a relaxing dinner and socialization. Later in the evening those who want to stay can join us in another room to listen to the great band Eight to the Bar. No cover charge. This room has a bar and a dance floor. It is occupied earlier in the evening, and is available to the public for the music and dancing
I realize that the next day is Mother's Day, and many of you probably have plans. This Eight to the Bar appearance just arrived in my email today.

1149 Website: http://www.elevenfort...

Eight to the Bar: http://www.eighttothe...

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Dinner, music and dancing at the 1149 Restaurant, Warwick
